content:
IsolatedStorageSecurityOptions Enum

Definition

Specifies options that affect security in isolated storage.

In this Article

public enum IsolatedStorageSecurityOptions
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
IsolatedStorageSecurityOptions

Remarks

The Options property gets this enumeration to determine which operations can be performed in isolated storage.

A host application can override the CheckSecuritySettings method to perform policy decisions based on a IsolatedStorageSecurityState object, and then allow or prevent the increase in the quota size for isolated storage.

Fields

IncreaseQuotaForApplication

The quota can be increased for isolated storage.
